--- format: html: code-fold: show code-summary: "Ocultar código" code-line-numbers: false code-annotations: false code-link: true code-tools: source: true toggle: true caption: "Código" code-overflow: scroll page-layout: full editor_options: chunk_output_type: console categories: - GEOM_AAA - GEOM_BBB - GEOM_CCC execute: eval: false echo: true warning: false title: "Semana 30" date: last-modified author: Víctor Gauto --- XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX XXXXX DESCRIPCIÓN DE LA FIGURA XXXXX XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX ![Semana 30, 2025](semana_30.png) ## Paquetes ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(glue) library(ggtext) library(showtext) library(tidyverse) ``` ::: ## Estilos Colores. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} c1 <- "#000000" c2 <- "#000000" c3 <- "#000000" ``` ::: Fuentes: Ubuntu y JetBrains Mono. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} font_add( family = "ubuntu", regular = "././fuente/Ubuntu-Regular.ttf", bold = "././fuente/Ubuntu-Bold.ttf", italic = "././fuente/Ubuntu-Italic.ttf" ) font_add( family = "jet", regular = "././fuente/JetBrainsMonoNLNerdFontMono-Regular.ttf" ) showtext_auto() showtext_opts(dpi = 300) ``` ::: ## Epígrafe ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} fuente <- glue( "Datos: ", "{{tidytuesdayR}} semana 30, ", "---FUENTE---." ) autor <- glue("**Víctor Gauto**") icon_twitter <- glue("") icon_instagram <- glue("") icon_github <- glue("") icon_mastodon <- glue("󰫑") icon_bsky <- glue("") usuario <- glue("**vhgauto**") sep <- glue("**|**") mi_caption <- glue( "{fuente}
{autor} {sep} {icon_github} {icon_twitter} {icon_instagram} ", "{icon_mastodon} {icon_bsky} {usuario}" ) ``` ::: ## Datos ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2025, 30) movies <- tuesdata$movies shows <- tuesdata$shows ``` ::: ## Procesamiento Me interesa... ::: {.cell} ::: ## Figura Figura. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- ggplot() ``` ::: Guardo. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave( plot = g, filename = "tidytuesday/2025/semana_30.png", width = 30, height = 30, units = "cm" ) browseURL(paste0(getwd(), "/tidytuesday/2025/semana_30.png")) ``` :::
